backend/main.mo: Main actor defining RoomListing type with photos field, storage mixin inclusion, and public functions to add room listings and query all/available rooms with sorting and filtering.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old RoomListing records (without photos) to new format by adding empty photos array to preserve existing data during canister upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features for photo upload functionality across AddListingPage, RoomCard, RoomDetailPage, and useQueries hooks with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files with focus on photo upload and display functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes using warm terracotta, beige, and sage color palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA meta tags, manifest link, theme color configuration, and app title "Bachelor Room Finder".
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons (192x192 and 512x512), theme colors, and standalone display mode for installable web app.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets and network-first for API calls with offline support and cache management.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with three routes (home, room detail, add listing) wrapped in Layout component.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing consistent page structure with Navigation header, main content container, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky header navigation bar with logo, app title, home/add listing buttons, and conditional PWA install button using usePWAInstall hook.
frontend/src/components/RoomCard.tsx: Room preview card component displaying first uploaded photo (or placeholder), title, location, rent amount, room type badge, and view details button with hover effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, query caching, and automatic invalidation when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: Custom React hook that manages PWA installation state and prompts, detecting if the app is installable, already installed, or running in standalone mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching available/all rooms and adding room listings, with automatic cache invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm color palette (terracotta, beige, sage) for both light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AddListingPage.tsx: Form page for adding new room listings with fields for title, rent, location, room type, amenities, contact info, and photo uploads with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page that displays a grid of available room listings using RoomCard components, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/RoomDetailPage.tsx: Detail page for individual room listings showing full information, photo carousel, amenities, and contact details with navigation back to listings.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, typography settings with Inter and Poppins fonts, custom animations for accordions, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting a room rental listing PWA application for bachelor accommodations, including implemented features like homepage grid, detailed room views, add listing form, warm visual theme, and PWA configuration with service worker and icons.
